heading: Add-ons
subheading: Mix and match modular add-ons to tailor every welcome kit or gift bundle to your brand

items.name: Premium 3-in-1 Essentials Set
items.description: A sleek combo featuring a metal bottle, metallic pen, and a premium diary. Perfect for corporate gifting or employee welcome kits.

items.name: Wooden Finish 3-in-1 Combo
items.description: A natural and earthy-themed set with a wooden bottle, wooden pen, and wooden-design diary — perfect for premium gifting.

items.name: Classic 2-in-1 Writing Kit
items.description: A refined corporate gifting combo with a premium leather diary and metallic pen, ideal for executives and professionals.

items.name: Leather Corporate Keepsake
items.description: A premium leather gift accessory designed in a sleek rectangular shape — a classy addition to any kit or gifting bundle.

items.name: Executive 3-in-1 Utility Set
items.description: A smart corporate gifting pack including a high-quality pen, stylish keychain, and a classic cardholder — compact and impactful.

items.name: Tech & Drinkware 4-in-1 Combo
items.description: A versatile gift set including a pen drive, bottle, pen, and keychain — suited for office gifting, events, and onboarding kits.

items.name: Elite 4-in-1 Leather Stationery Set
items.description: A premium office accessory set with a metallic pen, leather diary, keychain, and cardholder — stylish, compact, and professional.

items.name: Premium 8-in-1 Corporate Gift Set
items.description: A luxurious multi-utility corporate set featuring drinkware, stationery, and accessories — perfect for leadership & VIP gifting.

items.name: Rustic 5-in-1 Executive Hamper
items.description: A wooden theme inspired gift set featuring a metallic pen, leather diary, desk calendar, water bottle and keychain — elegant & warm.

items.name: 9-in-1 Onboarding & Corporate Kit
items.description: The ultimate employee welcome kit — complete with apparel, drinkware, stationery, laptop bag & more for an unforgettable first day.

note: ⚙️ Tip: Add-ons can be bundled with any value-for-money pack, standalone item, or custom kit for personalised gifting.
